name: The Request
description:
Till death do us part isn't always the way that things end up. After the death of her husband, Melanie finds herself in a predicament which ends up with her in the whirlwind of a drugs operation. Can you help Melanie get through this? What leads her to this place? Will Layla be safe? 

The request is a text-based adventure game exploring a woman's desperate search to fix her life after her husband's death. Your choices influence how the game ends, so choose wisely.
